question: 10 yrs ago i had my tubes tied,cut and burned my periods been regular since i missed 5 months can i be pg?
question_content: 10 yrs ago i had my tubes tied,cut and burned my periods been regular since i missed 5 months can i be pg?

answers.answer_content: Having all that done I would not think so. How old are you and have you gone through the change in life? But my wife had that done after our last was born and we were very active for about 10 years and nothing happened. She would get depressed now and then mostly when she was around little ones or look at pictures but that was about it. She should be ready now for the big change but she stays very active in her work. Not any time for other things now days. In your case you might have it check by a doctor and have them advice you.
It is unlikely that you are pregnant, but you could do a test. You don't say how old you are, but could you be starting an early menopause?
of course not!! if had your tubes tied and everything! but if you are not sure ask your ob.
